name: shipping_process_canada
title: Manufacturing to Canada Shipping Process
description: End-to-end shipping process flow from manufacturing plant through customs clearance to final delivery in Canada
python_code:
from diagrams import Diagram, Cluster, Edge
from diagrams.generic.place import Datacenter
from diagrams.generic.storage import Storage
from diagrams.generic.network import Router
from diagrams.generic.device import Tablet
from diagrams.generic.blank import Blank
from diagrams.onprem.client import Users, Client
from diagrams.onprem.compute import Server
from diagrams.onprem.database import PostgreSQL
from diagrams.saas.chat import Slack
from diagrams.programming.language import Python

graph_attr = {
    "fontsize": "24",
    "bgcolor": "white",
    "pad": "0.6",
    "splines": "ortho",
    "nodesep": "0.7",
    "ranksep": "0.9",
}

with Diagram(
    "Manufacturing to Canada Shipping Process",
    filename="OUTPUT_PATH",
    outformat="png",
    show=False,
    direction="LR",
    graph_attr=graph_attr
):
    with Cluster("Manufacturing Plant", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e8f5e9"}):
        production = Server("Production
Line")
        inventory = Storage("Inventory
Warehouse")
        wms = PostgreSQL("Warehouse
Management
System")
        
        production >> Edge(color="blue", label="Finished Goods") >> inventory
        inventory >> Edge(color="blue", style="dashed") >> wms
    
    with Cluster("Logistics & Documentation", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#fff3e0"}):
        shipping_clerk = Users("Shipping
Clerk")
        docs_system = Server("Documentation
System")
        carrier_portal = Tablet("Carrier
Portal")
        
        wms >> Edge(color="blue", label="Order Data") >> shipping_clerk
        shipping_clerk >> Edge(color="green", label="Create Docs") >> docs_system
        docs_system >> Edge(color="blue", label="EDI Transfer") >> carrier_portal
    
    with Cluster("Border Crossing", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#ffebee"}):
        customs_broker = Client("Customs
Broker")
        cbsa = Server("CBSA
System")
        compliance_check = Python("Compliance
Validation")
        
        carrier_portal >> Edge(color="orange", style="dashed", label="Pre-clearance") >> customs_broker
        customs_broker >> Edge(color="red", style="bold", label="Submit Entry") >> cbsa
        cbsa >> Edge(color="purple", style="dashed", label="Verification") >> compliance_check
    
    with Cluster("Canadian Distribution", graph_attr={"bgcolor": "#e3f2fd"}):
        cdn_warehouse = Datacenter("Canadian
Distribution
Center")
        tracking = Slack("Customer
Notifications")
        final_delivery = Router("Final Mile
Delivery")
        
        compliance_check >> Edge(color="green", label="Cleared") >> cdn_warehouse
        cdn_warehouse >> Edge(color="blue", label="Route Planning") >> final_delivery
        final_delivery >> Edge(color="green", style="dashed", label="Delivery Updates") >> tracking
    
    # Additional connections
    docs_system >> Edge(color="gray", style="dotted", label="Audit Trail") >> compliance_check
    inventory >> Edge(color="red", style="bold", label="Export Control") >> customs_broker
